pr_title: Update missing namespace error messages in UI to match backend error

timeline.bodyText: Should we define 'INVALID-NAMESPACE' as a constant since it's used across multiple places?
timeline.author: jennac3

replies.bodyText: Since it is only referenced once in each place, I am not sure it is necessary since it won't necessarily simplify the code. How do you think it would be helpful?
replies.author: yukiej

timeline.message: Remove specific error text checks for 404 errors
